plays.text: Goal scored by Ulf Dahlen assisted by Jason Arnott and Sergei Zubov
Penalty to Stu Barnes 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Lasse Pirjeta 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Steve Ott assisted by Kirk Muller and Derian Hatcher
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Tyler Wright 2 minutes for Roughing Derian Hatcher
Penalty to Scott Young 10 minutes for Attempt to Injure Jaroslav Spacek served by Steve Ott
Penalty to Derian Hatcher 2 minutes for Roughing Tyler Wright
Penalty to Sergei Zubov 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Scott Lachance 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
